amendment.description: To provide for enhanced border security, including strong border security metrics and congressional votes on border security and for other purposes.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1200 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 37. Record Vote Number: 154.
Amendment SA 1200 proposed by Senator Paul.
